Package Application.Reference

Class Colours

java.lang.Object
Application.Reference.Colours
public class Colours
extends java.lang.Object
Colours: The class used to store commonly used colours, with more options than the default class Color.
Author:
David Bulyaki
See Also:
Color

  • Field Details

    • MAX_ALPHA

      public static final int MAX_ALPHA
      MAX_ALPHA: The maximum alpha value of the defined, custom Color types. The alpha value refers to opacity. 255 = Max Opacity. 0 = Fully translucent / not visible.
      See Also:
